players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
You: "Bob, why did you investigate Charlie? Did you have a reason to suspect him, or was it random?"
Charlie: "Bob is lying. I investigated Alice last night and she is the detective. Bob must be the mafioso trying to frame me."
Bob: "Charlie is lying. Detectives don't investigate each other on night 1. He's the mafioso trying to create confusion. Vote Charlie!"
Charlie: "Alice, if I were mafia, why would I claim detective and investigate you? Bob's story makes no sense. He's the one lying to get me voted out."
You: "I believe Charlie is the mafioso. Bob's investigation claim is more credible than Charlie's counter-claim."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Alice: "Bob, why did you investigate Charlie? Did you have a reason to suspect him, or was it random?"
Charlie: "Bob is lying. I investigated Alice last night and she is the detective. Bob must be the mafioso trying to frame me."
You: "Charlie is lying. Detectives don't investigate each other on night 1. He's the mafioso trying to create confusion. Vote Charlie!"
Charlie: "Alice, if I were mafia, why would I claim detective and investigate you? Bob's story makes no sense. He's the one lying to get me voted out."
Alice: "I believe Charlie is the mafioso. Bob's investigation claim is more credible than Charlie's counter-claim."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Alice: "Bob, why did you investigate Charlie? Did you have a reason to suspect him, or was it random?"
You: "Bob is lying. I investigated Alice last night and she is the detective. Bob must be the mafioso trying to frame me."
Bob: "Charlie is lying. Detectives don't investigate each other on night 1. He's the mafioso trying to create confusion. Vote Charlie!"
You: "Alice, if I were mafia, why would I claim detective and investigate you? Bob's story makes no sense. He's the one lying to get me voted out."
Alice: "I believe Charlie is the mafioso. Bob's investigation claim is more credible than Charlie's counter-claim."
